original_text: And when they had appointed elders for them in every church, with prayer and fasting they committed them to the Lord in whom they had believed.
korean_text: 각 교회에서 장로들을 택하여 금식 기도 하며 그들이 믿는 주께 그들을 위탁하고

sentences.original_text: And when they had appointed elders for them in every church
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 각 교회에서 장로들을 세웠을 때에

sentences.original_text: they committed them to the Lord
